chapter.text: 37|1|Seizento retsu o nasu-sha-tachi ni oi te.
37|2|Karitate ou mono ni oi te.
37|3|Mata kunkai (no kuruan) o yomi kika seru mono ni oite, chikau.
37|4|Hontoni anata gata no kami wa, yuiitsu no omodearu.
37|5|Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono no shu, mata hinode o tsukasa doru omodearu.
37|6|Hontoni ware wa, shinshin de kaso no ten o kazari,
37|7|(arra no meirei ni) sakarau akuma ni taisuru mori to shita.
37|8|Kare-ra wa happo kara uta re, saiko no kaigi o nusumi kiku koto wa dekinai.
37|9|Gekitai sa rete, kare-ra wa towa no chobatsu o ukeru.
37|10|Tocho shi eta mono ga atte mo, hakunetsu no hono ga tsuiseki suru.

37|11|Kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) ni toe. `Kare-ra to ware no tsukutta mono (tenshi) no dochira ga tsuyoku tsukura rete iru ka.' Ware wa motomoto, nebari no aru doro de kare-ra o tsukutta nodearu.
37|12|Anata wa kantan shite iru to iu no ni, kare-ra wa chosho suru.
37|13|Keikoku sa rete mo, kare-ra wa keikoku o ukeirenai.
37|14|Mata kare-ra wa, shirushi o mite mo chosho suru bakari.
37|15|Soshite kare-ra wa iu. `Kore wa akiraka ni majutsu ni chigai arimasen.
37|16|Watashi-tachi ga shinde tsuchi to hone ni natte kara,(mata) yobiokosa remashou ka.
37|17|Toi sosen-tachi mo (issho nidesu ka) to iu.
37|18|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Sonotori. Anata gata wa iyashime rareru nodearu.'
37|19|Sore wa tada hitokoe no sakebidearu. Sonotoki kare-ra wa (osoroshi kokei o) manoatari ni mite,
37|20|`a nasakenai, kore ga shinpan no hidesu ka.' To iu.
37|21|`Kore wa anata gata ga shinjinakatta kubun no hidearu.
37|22|Fugi o okonatte ita-sha-tachi, sono tsuma-tachi, mata kare-ra ga arra o sashioite hai shite ita mono-tachi o atsume nasai.
37|23|Kare-ra o hi goku e no michi ni tsurete ike.
37|24|Iya, kare-ra o mata sete oke. Kare-ra ni tazuneru koto ga aru.
37|25|Anata gata ga tasukeawanai no wa do shita koto ka.'
37|26|Iya, kyo bakari wa, kare-ra mo (shinpan ni) fuku suru.
37|27|Kare-ra wa tagaini chikadzuki tazune au.
37|28|Ippo wa iu. `Hontoni anata gata wa, migi kara kimashita.'
37|29|Suruto taho wa iu. `Iya, anata gata wa,(motomoto) shinjade wa arimasendeshita.
37|30|Mata, watashi-tachi wa anata gata ni oshitsukeru ken'i mo arimasendeshita. Soreni anata gata wa hangyaku no todeshita.
37|31|Sore de omo no o kotoba ga, watashi-tachi ni jissho sa reta ima, watashi-tachi wa,(chobatsu o) ajiwawaneba naranai.
37|32|Watashi-tachi wa anata gata o mayowa setaga, watashi-tachi jishin mo mayotte ita nodesu.'
37|33|Koshite sonohi, kare-ra wa,(subete) tomoni chobatsu o ukeru.
37|34|Hontoni ware wa kono yo ni tsumi o okashita mono o jobunsuru.
37|35|Kare-ra wa,`arra no soto ni kami wa arimasen.' To tsuge rareru to, itsumo koman ni natta.
37|36|Soshite,`kichigai shijin no tame ni, watashi-tachi no kamigami o sutete naru monodesu ka.' To itte ita.
37|37|Iya, kare wa shinri o motarashite,(kare izen no) yogen-sha-tachi (no Keisuke) o kakusho suru monodearu.
37|38|Anata gata wa, kanarazu itamashi chobatsu o ajiwaudearou.
37|39|Dose mina anata gataga okonatta koto no mukuidearu.
37|40|Daga arra no chuseina shimo be-tachi wa,-betsudearu.
37|41|Sorera no mono ni wa, sadame no onkei ga ari,
37|42|(yorokobashi) kajitsu, soshite eiyo ga (sadzuke rare),
37|43|shifuku no rakuen no naka de,
37|44|nedoko no ue de mukaiau.
37|45|Kiyoi izumi kara kunda hai wa, kare-ra ni yukiwatari,
37|46|mashiro (na bishu wa), nomu mono ni kokochiyoi ama-sa.
37|47|Kore wa, zutsu o moyosazu, yowa se mo shinai.
37|48|Mata kare-ra no soba ni wa, fushime-gachina oki me (no otome) ga iru.
37|49|Ka no on'na-ra wa, chuibukaku mamora rete iru tamago no yo.
37|50|Yagate kare-ra wa, tagaini chikadzuki tazune au.
37|51|Kare-ra no hitori ga, kuchi o kitte iu. `Watashi ni hitori no shitashi tomo ga imashita.
37|52|Kare wa itte ita. “Anata made (fukkatsu no hi o) shinjite iru nodesu ka.
37|53|Watashi-tachi ga shinde tsuchi to hone ni natte kara, hontoni shinpan sa reru nodeshou ka.”'
37|54|Mata itta. `Ma minasan mioroshite mi nasai.'
37|55|Sokode kare ga miorosu to, hi goku no tadanaka ni kare no sugata ga mieta.
37|56|Kare wa itta. `Arra ni kakete, anata wa mosukoshi de watashi o hametsu sa seru tokorodeshita.
37|57|Moshi omo no onmegumi ga nakattanaraba, watashi wa kanarazu hikitate rareru mono no naka ni itadeshou.'
37|58|`Watashi-tachi (rakuen no nakama) wa, saisho no shi dakede mata,
37|59|shinu koto wa nai nodesu ka. Mata, watashi-tachi ga, chobatsu o ukeru koto wa nai nodeshou ka.'
37|60|`-Sodearunara kore wa, shijo no kofuku no jojudesu.
37|61|Kono yona koto no tame ni, kodo shi doryoku subekidesu.'
37|62|Sore wa kekkona kantaide wanai ka. Soretomo zakkumu no ki (o toru no) ka.
37|63|Ware wa kono ki o fugi o okonau mono e no kokoromi to shite, yoi shita nodearu.
37|64|Sore wa jigoku no soko ni haeru ki de,
37|65|sono jitsuwa, akuma no atama no yodearu.
37|66|Kare-ra wa kore o tabete, hara wa sore de ibbai.
37|67|Sore kara ue ni futto suru yu o sosogi tasa re,
37|68|sorekara hi goku ni kaeri tsuku nodearu.
37|69|Kare-ra wa sosen no mayotte ita no o mitomenagara mo,
37|70|sono ashiato o isoide (aruite) ita nodearu.
37|71|Mukashi no oku no sosen-tachi mo, tashika ni mayotte ita.
37|72|Daga ware wa kare-ra ni, kanarazu keikoku-sha o noko wa shita.
37|73|Miruga i. Keikoku sa rete mo mushi shita mono no saigo ga, dodeatta ka o.
37|74|(Daga) arra no chuseina shimo be-tachi wa,-betsudearu.
37|75|Katsute nufu wa ware ni aigan shita. Ware wa mottomo sugureta oto-shadearu.
37|76|Ware wa, kare to sono kazoku o dainan kara sukutta.
37|77|Soshite kare no shison o ikinokora seta.
37|78|Mata ato no iku sedai ni watari, kare no tame ni (shukufuku no kotoba o) tometa.
37|79|`Banbutsu (ningen, tenshi, Jin) no naka de tokuni nufu no ue ni heian'are.' To (ware kara no arigatai o kotoba o).
37|80|Ware wa kono yo ni, tadashi okonai no mono ni mukuiru.
37|81|Hontoni kare wa, shinjinbukai waga shimo bedeatta.
37|82|Sorekara ware wa sono soto no mono o, obore saseta.
37|83|Mata kare no kokei-sha no nakaniha iburahimu ga ita.
37|84|Kare ga junseina kokoro o motte kare no omo no moto ni yattekita ori ni,
37|85|jibun no chichi ya sono ichizoku ni mukatte itta. `Anata gata no suhai suru mono wa nanidesu ka.
37|86|Arra o sashioite 瞞 Shi no kamigami o o nozomina nodesu ka.
37|87|Ittai, ban'yu no omo ni tsuite, anata gata wa dono yo ni kangaete oidena nodesu ka.'
37|88|Sonotoki kare wa Moroboshi o hitome mite,
37|89|itta. `Watashi wa, hontoni (kokoro ga) itamu.'
37|90|Hitobito wa kare ni se o mukete satta.
37|91|Sonotoki kare (iburahimu) wa, kare-ra no kamigami ni mukatte itta. `Anata gata wa tabenai nodesu ka.
37|92|Anata gata wa, doshitemo no o iwanai nodesu ka.'
37|93|Sokode kare wa, kare-ra (guzo) o migite de utta.
37|94|Sonotoki hitobito wa, awatete kare no sho e yattekita.
37|95|Suruto kare wa itta. `Anata gata wa,(jibun de) kizanda mono o suhai suru nodesu ka.
37|96|Hontoni arra wa, anata gata o tsukuri, mata anata gataga, tsukuru mono o mo (tsukura reru).'
37|97|Hitobito wa itta. `Kare (iburahimu) no tame ni ro o kizuki, moesakaru hi no naka ni nagekomi nasai.'
37|98|Kono yo ni kare ni sakubo o meguraseyou to shitaga, ware wa kare-ra o sanzan'na me ni awa seta.
37|99|Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa omo no omoto ni ikou. Kanarazu watashi o michibika rerudearou.
37|100|Omo yo, tadashi jinbutsu ni naru yona (musuko) o, watashi ni o sazuke kudasai.'
37|101|Sorede ware wa, yasashi omoiyari no aru danji o (sazukeru to iu) kippo o tsutaeta.

37|102|(Kono-ko ga) kare to tomoni hataraku toshigoro ni natta toki, kare wa itta. `Musuko yo, watashi wa anata o gisei ni sasageru yume o mimashita. Sa, anata wa do kangaeru nodesu ka.' Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Chichiyo, anata ga meiji rareta yo ni shite kudasai. Moshi arra ga o nozominaraba, watashi ga taeshinobu koto ga o wakarideshou.'
37|103|Sokode kare-ra ryonin wa (meirei ni) fuku shite, kare (kodomo) ga gaku o (ji ni tsuke) utsubuse ni natta toki,
37|104|ware wa tsugeta. `Iburahimu yo.
37|105|Anata wa tashika ni ano yume o jissen shita. Hontoni ware wa, kono yo ni tadashi okonai o suru mono ni mukuiru.
37|106|Kore wa akiraka ni kokoromideatta.'
37|107|Ware wa okina gisei de kare o aganai,
37|108|suenagaku kare no tame ni (kono shukufuku o) tometa.
37|109|`Iburahimu ni heian'are.'(To itte).
37|110|Kono yo ni ware wa, tadashi okonai o suru mono ni mukuiru.
37|111|Hontoni kare wa, waga shinjinbukai shimo bedeatta.
37|112|Mata ware wa tadashi jinbutsu, yogen-sha isuhaku no (tanjo no) kippo o kare ni tsutaeta.
37|113|Soshite ware wa, kare to isuhaku o shukufuku shita. Daga kare-ra no shison no nakaniha tadashi okonai o suru mono mo ari, mata akiraka ni mizukara o sokonau mono mo atta.
37|114|Ware wa, musa to harun ni onkei o hodokoshita.
37|115|Mata kare-ra ryonin, soshite sono min o okina sainan kara sukuidashi,
37|116|ware ga tasuketa tame ni kare-ra wa (sono kon'nan o) kokufuku suru koto ga dekita.
37|117|Nao ware wa, ryonin ni (jiri o) meiryo ni sa seru keiten o sazuke,
37|118|kare-ra o tadashi michi ni michibiita.
37|119|Ware wa ato no iku sedai ni watari, kare-ra no tame ni (kono shukufuku o) tometa.
37|120|`Musa to harun ni heian'are.'(To itte).
37|121|Kono yo ni ware wa, tadashi okonai o suru mono ni mukuiru.
37|122|Hontoni kare-ra ryonin wa shinjinbukai waga shimo bedeatta.
37|123|Hontoni iruyasu mo, shitodeatta.
37|124|Kare ga sono min ni ko itta toki o omoe. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.
37|125|Anata gata wa baru ni inotte, saiko no sozonushi (arra) o misuteru nodesu ka.
37|126|Arra koso anata gata no shu, mukashi no fuso-tachi no omode wa nai nodesu ka.'
37|127|Daga kare-ra wa kare (iruyasu) o uso-tsukidearu to shita. Dakara kanarazu (shobatsu ni) nozomudearou.
37|128|(Kare-ra no naka) keiken'na, arra no shimo be wa betsudearu.
37|129|Ware wa ato no iku sedai ni watari, kare no tame ni (kono shukufuku o) tometa.
37|130|`Iruyasu ni heian'are.'(To itte).
37|131|Kono yo ni ware wa, tadashi okonai o suru mono ni mukuiru.
37|132|Hontoni kare wa shinjinbukai waga shimo bedeatta.
37|133|Ruto mo (ware ga) tsukawashita monodeatta.
37|134|Miyo, ware wa kare to sono kazoku no subete o sukutta.
37|135|Ato ni nokoru mono no naka ni ita, roba no soto wa.
37|136|Soshite ware wa,-gai no mono o horoboshite shimatta.
37|137|Anata gata wa kare-ra no (iseki no) katawara o, hiru
37|138|yoru kayotte iru. Anata gata wa sore demo satoranai no ka.
37|139|Hontoni yunusu mo, shitodeatta.
37|140|Kare ga (ni o) mansai shita fune ni (notte) nogareta toki,
37|141|kare wa kuji o hiite, makete shimatta.
37|142|(Soshite umi ni nagekoma reruto) taigyo ni marunomi ni sa re, kare wa jiseki no nen ni kara reta.
37|143|Kare ga (kaigo shite omo o) tataenakattanaraba,
37|144|kare-ra (hitobito) ga (fukkatsu shite) okosa reru hi made, kanarazu kare wa sakana no haranouchi ni tomattadearou.
37|145|Daga ware wa, arehateta (kishibe) ni kare o uchiageta. Kare wa yande ita.
37|146|Ware wa kare no ue ni, 1-pon no Hisago ki o shigera se (kage o tsukutta).
37|147|Soshite 10 man-ri, matawa sore ijo (no min) ni kare o tsukawashita.
37|148|Kare-ra ga shinko ni haittanode, ware wa shibashi gense no kyoraku o yurushita.
37|149|Sate kare-ra ni toe. `Anata gata no omo wa musume o mochi, kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) wa musuko o motsu to iu no ka.
37|150|Soretomo kare-ra wa, ware ga tenshi-tachi o on'na ni tsukutta to shogen suru no ka.'
37|151|Miyo, kare-ra no iu koto wa tsukurigotodearu.
37|152|Arra ga ko o umareru to wa, kare-ra mo uso-tsuki no todearu.
37|153|Kare wa musuko yori mo, musume o erabareru to suru no ka.
37|154|Do shita no ka. Anata gata wa do handan suru no ka.
37|155|Anata gata wa nao kunkai o ukeirenai no ka.
37|156|Soretomo anata gata ni meiryona ken'no ga aru no ka.
37|157|Anata gata no iu koto ga shinjitsunaraba, anata gata no keiten o dashite mi nasai.
37|158|Kare-ra wa, kare to Jin wa shinruidearu to itte iru. Daga Jin wa jibun-tachi ga (chobatsu ni) nozomu koto o yoku shitte iru.
37|159|Arra ni tatae are. (Kare wa) kare-ra ga haisuru mono kara (chozetsu nasa reru).
37|160|Daga kenkyo ni hoshi suru arra no shimo be-tachi wa,-betsudearu.
37|161|Daga anata gata ni shite mo, anata gataga suhai suru monode mo,
37|162|kare ni hanko shite (shinja-tachi o) yuwaku suru koto ga dekiyou ka.
37|163|Moesakaru hi de, yaka reru mono wa betsuni shite.
37|164|(Seiretsu shite iru-sha-tachi ga iu. ) `Watashi-tachi wa onono sadame no busho o motte imasu.
37|165|Watashi-tachi wa (hoshi no tame) seiretsu shite,
37|166|tsutsushinde (arra o) tatae 唱念 Shimasu.'
37|167|Mata, kare-ra wa itsumo itte ita.
37|168|`Moshi watashi-tachi ga, mukashikara kunkai o motte itanara,
37|169|Watashi-tachi mo, tashika ni arra no kenkyona shimo bedeattadeshou.'
37|170|Tokoroga (jissai ni kuruan ga atae rarereba) sore o kyohi suru.Daga mamonaku kare-ra wa shirudearou.
37|171|Tashikani ware no kotoba wa, waga tsukawashita shimo be-tachi ni sudeni kudasa rete iru.
37|172|Kare-ra wa, kanarazu tasuke rareyou.
37|173|Hontoni ware no gunzei wa, kanarazu shori o eru nodearu.
37|174|Anata (muhanmado) wa kare-ra kara shibarakunoaida tozakatte,
37|175|kare-ra o kanshi shi nasai. Yagate, kare-ra wa mezamerudearou.
37|176|Daga kare-ra wa, waga chobatsu o isogi motomete iru.
37|177|Daga sore ga jissai ni kare-ra ni kudaru to, sore made keikoku o ukete iru dake ni nezame no warui asa to narou.
37|178|Sorede anata wa kare-ra kara shibarakunoaida tozakatte,
37|179|kare-ra o kanshi shi nasai. Yagate, kare-ra mo mezamerudearou.
37|180|Anata no shu, itoku no shu, kare-ra ga haisuru mono kara (chozetsu nasa reru) omo ni tatae are.
37|181|Shito-tachi ni heian'are.
37|182|Ban'yu no shu, arra ni tatae are.
